column3: str

Vuyargur would see the altar polished to a breathless sheen.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the ardent altarkeeper at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
Use the polishing powder at the designated locations.
Speak with Vuyargur.
Ever since you helped us to restore the Breathless Altar, we have seen an influx of visitors come to pay their respects.
As such, the keeper in charge has grown rather...<Emphasis>impassioned</Emphasis> about its maintenance.
For that reason have I acquired this polishing powder from a merchant. Will you go and see it safely delivered into her hands?
The altarkeeper has requested more polishing powder for the Breathless Altar. Would you kindly take it to her, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>?
And if she asks you to assist in its application...well, you won't mind, I hope.
Polishing powder! Oh, thank you for bringing this to me! I was just admiring the crystals.
Pretty, aren't they? The hue differs from glowstone, but it is said to signify rich memories of the time when this place slept beneath the sea.
And according to Dartorgor's living sepulchre, the snow spirits are drawn to them, too, because they glint like ice in the sunlight! Isn't that something?
Sorry, what were we talking about? ...Right! The crystals! Need to polish them!
You know, it would mean much to the Breathless Altar if a storied warrior were to do the honors. Take this powder and polish to your heart's content!
The crystals would be most grateful if you were to assist me.
You may report back to Vuyargur now, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. As altarkeeper, I shall attend to the rest personally.
Welcome back, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I must thank you for not only delivering the polishing agent, but aiding in the maintenance work as well.
After lying forgotten for all those years, the Breathless Altar has been raised high by the hands of Yok Huy and many others such as you.
Zeal for crystals aside, the keeper's dedication motivates all of us to do our part in looking after the altar.
I hope you will help us to preserve its radiance, that we may enjoy the snow spirits' favor for years to come.
